subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: In an interview, Dr. Dean W. Richardson reflected on his treatment of Barbaro, the colt’s greatness and spirit, and on the public outpouring for the 2006 Kentucky Derby winner.
snippet: In an interview, Dr. Dean W. Richardson reflected on his treatment of Barbaro, the colt’s greatness and spirit, and on the public outpouring for the 2006 Kentucky Derby winner.
